document_data.name: Kriv
document_data.mainbody: '''Kriv''' was one of the few [[dragonborn]] [[wizard]]s of [[Tymanther]].
document_data.Description: Kriv had yellow eyes and bronze scales flecked with black.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], Kriv was one of the wizards [[Vanquisher]] [[Tarhun]] sought to study the [[dragonspawn]]-controlling [[orb]]s created by [[Nala]].
